Title: Woodside Energy CEO Downplays LNG Risk From Russia-China Pipeline Deal
Description: Woodside Energy shrugged off concerns that liquefied natural gas demand in Asia would ebb following the announcement that Russia’s Gazprom PJSC is building the Power of Siberia 2 gas pipeline to China.

Title: Long-hidden methane leak in Darwin raises fresh doubts over Australia's climate action
Description: Environment groups have called for federal intervention following revelations that an LNG export hub in Darwin has emitted large volumes of methane from an LNG storage tank since 2006.

Title: Ukrainian drone strikes strangle Putin’s fuel supplies
